Once upon a time, in a cozy old shoe nestled under a sprawling oak tree, lived a clever little mouse named Mabel. Unlike her friends, who scurried around searching for crumbs, Mabel transformed her shoe into a snug home, complete with a tiny library of acorn caps. One sunny day, she discovered a group of lost ants wandering nearby. Remembering her own adventures, Mabel invited them in, sharing her stories and acorn cap books. Grateful for her kindness, the ants helped Mabel gather food for the winter. From that day on, the shoe became a hub of friendship, laughter, and shared tales.
